channel.title: [HELP] Please
channel.description:
Allright, so:
I've had my Server posted on the serverstatus page, I hosted it on my local Ip-adress. Once i have enough money for buying vps, i bought them and reposted it without thinking i had already posted my server so i got banned. Now, My server was at 70% Uptime so it's about 55% now, Once it has been removed, could i get a unban for my VPS ip adress? Local ip: 84.107.169.94 (www.voterunescar.tk) is the page where it is on. VpsIP: 64.186.152.212 this one is currently banned,
May i have unban once my Local ip has been removed? AND: I already sended an PM to Moparisthebest but no answer for a week, hes probably busy.
Thank you,
Jeff

item.title: [HELP] Please
